channel.title: Hexedit help! i downloaded it, now what do i do!?!?!
channel.description: the title kinda explains it, i have downloaded the hexedit program, so how do i begin hacking rs (or whatever hexedit does)

item.title: Hexedit help! i downloaded it, now what do i do!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

Yes all the same that martain said, and the items, cash that you edit the value of will go back to its original value in a trade or if you logout.

item.source: Hexedit help! i downloaded it, now what do i do!?!?!

item.title: Hexedit help! i downloaded it, now what do i do!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

mrtn4:

hexedit is not a runescape hack! it lets you open up a file and view it in hexedecimal

Yea but you can still change values n shit, he wants to know how to use it not, know what it is or what it does,

wcd727:

the title kinda explains it, i have downloaded the hexedit program, so how do i begin hacking rs (or whatever hexedit does)

You can client hack, which means anything you change wll not actually change it will just change back when the server realises that its not at the correct value,

You will be at risk of getting banned also!

Read full topic
